actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to establish within the United States Information Agency the Andrei Sakharov Educational Exchange Program.
short_title: Andrei Sakharov Educational Exchange Act of 1990

summary.text: Andrei Sakharov Educational Exchange Act of 1990 - Amends the Mutual Educational and Cultural Exchange Act of 1961 to establish the Andrei Sakharov Educational Exchange Program to further U.S.-Soviet cooperation in the fields of environmental protection and the health sciences through the exchange of graduate students. Makes management of such program the responsibility of the Bureau of Educational and Cultural Affairs in the U.S. Information Agency.

titles.title: Andrei Sakharov Educational Exchange Act of 1990
A bill to establish within the United States Information Agency the Andrei Sakharov Educational Exchange Program.
